constituent: hop, wooden leg, mouth, stop, footprint, portent, omen
koohiiStory1: A girl with a wooden leg always wanted to play hopscotch with the other girls, but every time she tried to hop she´d lose her balance and injure another girl. That´s why the other girls make fun of her and see her presence as a portent to injury.
koohiiStory2: A turtle with a wooden leg needs to hop to get around.
readingExamples: 跳ぶ (と.ぶ), 跳ねる (は.ねる)
words:
跳ぶ(とぶ): jump, fly, leap, spring, bound, hop
跳ねる(はねる): jump, leap, prance, spring up, bound, hop
